short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand the functionality of the terrible thing that is workforce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add on for Workforce. Adds functionality to hour tracking. Currently displays live hours worked on the tab title. Automatically calculates lunch and subtracts from your time.

Settings popup window brags appealing toggle switches that grant the power of dark mode, turning off tab display, and adjust whether seconds are displayed, or minutes only!

 More features on their way!!!!!!
